data.text: Happy days, Index360 is on UAT. http://uat.index360.co.za/ and http://admin.index360.co.za/ . There is a lot of SW and other products related features in both systems. Please let us know what needs to be removed or skinned. I'm still busy with cleaning up stuff but at least you guys can test so long and assist in getting this product to LIVE. Please let me know who needs access so that i can create you an account. @cobuspienaar @willemhuman @lylenutt @yasserogier @sameerkumandan1 @shaunviljoen @gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth @jakovanrensburg  (P.S. Not sure if the below request from Neil has been implemented though)
